Name: Santorini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Scotch whisky and sweet vermouth combine harmoniously with ouzo providing subtle and complementary aniseed notes.
History: Created in December 2014 by yours truly as an adaption of a drink called an Islander created by Gary "gaz" Regan which uses Pernod anise. Santorini is an island in the southern Aegean Sea and I was inspired to use a combination of whisky and ouzo due to being challenged with demonstrating the mixability of scotch whisky to a group of Greek bartenders in Athens.
Nutrition: One serving of Santorini contains 176 calories
